A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Weapon sockets. 
- Item Effect: Critical Hit Rate +1

※ This magic crystal has a low chance of shattering if your Character dies. It doesn’t stack with Ancient Magic Crystal - Crimson Flame.

- Equipment can be transfused through Black Spirits.
